name: Pivotal Feedback Form for WP
author: ifourtechnolab

sections.description:
A WordPress plugin that allows users to submit feedback including bugs and features to Pivotal Tracker. Only user need to obtain API key and Project id from pivotal tracker and submit in admin.

Use [pivotal-feedback-form] Shortcode for generating feedback form in any post, pages or custom post type.

After installing this plugin, one needs to get API key from Pivotaltracker Profile. and project ID from Projects.

Pivotal Feedback Form is built using Pivotaltracker REST API v5.

Pivotaltracker :- Pivotaltracker Doc

Pivotaltracker :- Help.

Pivotaltracker :- Dashboard.

Pivotaltracker :- Sign In.

Pivotaltracker :- Sign Up.

For Support :- Contact Us.
sections.faq:
1. It is free ?
    Yes.- “Pivotal Feedback Form for WP” is totally free and there are no extra charges for used this plugin
  2. It is Configurable ?
    Yes.- Pivotal Feedback Form for WP is configurable from admin.

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload pivotal-feedback-form.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. After activation Pivotal Feedback Form for WP one configuration link is shown in plugin manager and it is also shown in admin menu.
  4. Go to Pivotal Feedback Form and add your Pivotal Tracker account API token and Project ID.

After installing this plugin, one needs to get API key from Pivotaltracker Profile. and project ID Create Project.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Pivotal Feedback Form for WP is ready for production.
